item.title: PI Resting Skill HELP
item.dc:creator: @king_he_he king he he
item.description:
@king_he_he wrote:

hey i been trying to add a resting skill so i came up with these codes but the button i added wont work i am trying to add these codes to a button for the skill.â€”Can someone help me make a button and tell me where to add this?if this helps itsa a hyrbid pvp v3 base thanks for your help1!
case 114113:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastThieve < 2000)
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100);
c.startAnimation(5713);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(105*c.playerLevel[23], c.playerResting);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.playerResting);
